name: Desktop Corruption
description:
A platformer where you get to play as a computer virus and corrupt a computer to your heart's content! While some files make it easier to navigate the level, you aren't required to get all of them .  Explore and experiment to see how far you can go, or try to destroy the computer as quickly as you can!

Controls:

Run - Arrow keys

Jump - Space bar

Enable sound - There is no sound.
